snippet: The head of the state’s education agency will appoint a board of managers to oversee the El Paso Independent School District, as its current board of trustees is now in disgrace.
abstract: Michael L Williams, head of Texas education agency, is appointing a board of managers to oversee the El Paso Independent School District, stripping current seven-member board of trustees of their power in aftermath of a cheating scandal.
lead_paragraph: The head of the state’s education agency will appoint a board of managers to oversee the El Paso Independent School District, as its current board of trustees is now in disgrace.

headline.main: Texas: El Paso School Trustees Replaced After Cheating Scandal
headline.print_headline: Texas: El Paso School Trustees Replaced After Cheating Scandal
